abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Increases the power of a move/ability if the active  user's stat is a tie with no status effect or if the active user's same-stat rival  uses the item or ability that either causes their stat to rise or stat to fall by the same amount.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Negates the effect of an opponent's ability that involves switching in with an ability.
